pages.title: Discovering Spells
pages.text: Spells are a form to cast magic similar to glyphs. However, unlike the former, spells aren't consumed upon used, but instead have a cooldown (of which you can see on each spell's tooltip).$(br2)$(l)Discovering Spells$()$(br2)To start discovering spells,
you must craft a $(l)Exponentia Glyph $()and use it on a regular $(l)Crafting Table$().$(br2)Keep in mind you must break it with silk touch, otherwise it'll transform back into a Crafting Table.
